meanings.definition: The quality or state of being uproarious.
meanings.sent1: The uproariousness of the children playing in the park could be heard from far away.
meanings.sent2: The party was filled with uproariousness as everyone danced and laughed together.
meanings.sent3: The uproariousness of the puppy chasing its tail was both adorable and chaotic.
meanings.sent4: The uproariousness of the thunderstorm echoed through the night, shaking the windows.
meanings.sent5: The uproariousness of the crowd at the concert made the singer feel energized and alive.

meanings.definition: A state of noisy and excited activity.
meanings.sent1: The uproariousness of the market on a busy day was overwhelming but exciting.
meanings.sent2: The classroom was filled with uproariousness as the students worked on their group project.
meanings.sent3: The uproariousness of the birds chirping outside woke me up with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The uproariousness of the city streets at night felt like a symphony of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The uproariousness of the festival could be felt in the air, with music and laughter all around.
